admin

Class RoleManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • admin.RoleManager

  • public abstract class RoleManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages user role assignments. Used by CommandTarget to authorize users who issue commands.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  RoleManager.RolePermission
      Assignment between a Role and the Permissions it was given.
      (package private) class  RoleManager.UserRoleAssignment
      One-to-one assignment of User and a Role.
